statements: SELECT * FROM community_resources;
SELECT name, type, address FROM community_resources;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM community_resources WHERE type='library';
SELECT * FROM community_resources WHERE website LIKE '%.com';
SELECT name, type, address FROM community_resources ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_resources WHERE type = 'Library' ORDER BY name ASC, address DESC
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM community_resources WHERE type = 'School' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM community_resources WHERE type = 'Hospital' ORDER BY address ASC
SELECT id, name, website FROM community_resources WHERE type = 'Park' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM community_resources WHERE type = 'Museum' AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM food_banks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT name AS ShelterName, contact_info AS Contact FROM shelters WHERE id = 3;
SELECT location, name FROM food_banks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM shelters WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM food_banks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, location FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM food_banks WHERE id IN (1, 4, 7);
SELECT * FROM shelters WHERE capacity < 30 ORDER BY capacity DESC, name ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(id) AS count FROM food_banks GROUP BY location HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_banks;
SELECT name, location FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT id, name, description FROM support_services WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM food_banks WHERE name LIKE '%Community%';
SELECT name, location, capacity, services_provided FROM shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_banks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location, services_provided FROM shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT name, location, contact FROM support_services WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, description FROM food_banks WHERE description LIKE '%emergency%';
SELECT * FROM food_banks;
SELECT name, location FROM shelters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, category, description FROM support_services WHERE category='Counseling';
SELECT id, location, contact FROM food_banks WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM referrals WHERE referral_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM shelters;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM food_banks WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT name, category, description FROM support_services WHERE category = 'Healthcare';
SELECT name, contact FROM shelters ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FoodBanks;
SELECT id, name, address FROM Shelters ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM SupportServices WHERE id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM ServiceCategories;
SELECT provider_name, service_id, location_id FROM ServiceProviders WHERE provider_name LIKE '%support%';
SELECT * FROM FoodBanks ORDER BY name ASC, address DESC, id
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM FoodBanks WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) OR id = 5
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_food_banks FROM FoodBanks
SELECT name AS provider_name, description AS service_description FROM ServiceProviders JOIN SupportServices ON ServiceProviders.service_id = SupportServices.id
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM ServiceCategories
